original_text: But you and your sons and your daughters may eat the breast that was waved and the thigh that was presented. Eat them in a ceremonially clean place; they have been given to you and your children as your share of the Israelites’ fellowship offerings.
korean_text: 흔든 가슴과 들어올린 뒷다리는 너와 네 자녀가 너와 함께 정결한 곳에서 먹을지니 이는 이스라엘 자손의 화목제물 중에서 네 소득과 네 아들들의 소득으로 주신 것임이니라

sentences.original_text: But you and your sons and your daughters may eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그러나 당신과 당신의 아들들과 당신의 딸들은 먹을 수 있습니다

sentences.original_text: and the thigh that was presented
Eat them in a ceremonially clean place
they have been given to you and your children
as your share of the Israelites' fellowship offerings
sentences.korean_translation: 이스라엘 사람들의 교제 제물에서 당신의 몫으로
